pageContext.claim: “They ought to be ashamed of themselves -- what they've done to General Flynn, what they've done to others. And then the really guilty ones -- people that have committed major crimes -- are getting away with it.”
pageContext.analysis: Flynn and other Trump associates pleaded guilty or were convicted by a jury. Trump claims that Hillary Clinton, former FBI director James Comey and others deserved to be charged, but they were investigated by the Justice Department with no charges brought.
